K-Kid is a great uploader, but in the event there are serial issues, perhaps checking out thethingy's upload.  Therein you will find a crack file to paste into the Acrobat directory in Prog Files, plus also there is a text file that has language to be added into the hosts file which continuously reroutes the updaters back into the host folder which is domiciled in your C: drive.  Ergo the program will make outgoing calls, but the Hosts redirects those calls back in house.

I also suggest going into any PDF hit hitting Ctrl/K to open the Preferences Window.  Scroll to the last option and turn off updater.
